original_title: Top Gear France - Road trip en Écosse
overview: As a tribute to John McAdam, the team will drive across 700km in the Highlands with a BMW M3 E46, a Honda S2000 and a Jaguar XKR. They will play golf, spend the night in a haunted castle and look for Nessie! Could it be any cliché-er?
tagline: The wheel is on the other side in Scotland
title: Top Gear France - Driving with a kilt
